data.name: 0000 (286.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oh yeah, Nagato taught me how to speed read earlier.

data.name: 0001 (286.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Really? Well, I suppose Yuki's reading speed is nothing to sneeze at.

data.name: 0002 (286.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Thanks to her I was able to read books like crazy, just like Nagato herself can.

data.name: 0003 (286.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well if you learn to read fast but still can't take in what you read...

data.name: 0004 (286.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ...isn't that pointless?

data.name: 0005 (286.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ugh... Not where it hurts, please...

data.name: 0006 (286.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Truth be told, speed reading is too difficult anyway--there's no way I could learn it.

data.name: 0007 (286.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Naturally I'll keep that to myself though.

data.name: 0008 (286.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I always think it's so impressive how Nagato can read so fast.

data.name: 0009 (286.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Right? I wonder if she's learned to speed read.

data.name: 0010 (286.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That reminds me--Kyon was trying to learn speed reading from Nagato in the club room.

data.name: 0011 (286.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Though when he was given a book to speed read, it looked like he read it really slowly.

data.name: 0012 (286.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Seriously, how can you be more useless?!

data.name: 0013 (286.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ehehe, I think that's very like him.

data.name: 0014 (286.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …Well, I won't deny that, in the sense that he's really stupid.

data.name: 0015 (286.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The subliminal speedreading method mentioned in the clubroom.

data.name: 0016 (286.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Oh yeah, what about it?

data.name: 0017 (286.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Your way of thinking was correct.

data.name: 0018 (286.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: In many instant memorization techniques, a page is memorized as an image.

data.name: 0019 (286.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Wow, good job, Yuki. ...Or maybe I should say--good job me.

data.name: 0020 (286.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Most likely--the latter.

data.name: 0021 (286.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Right? Hehe... I'll brag to Kyon about it later.

data.name: 0022 (286.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I wonder if there's an important key to mastering Nagato's speed reading technique.

data.name: 0023 (286.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Good point.

data.name: 0024 (286.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Though once you get the trick to speed reading, anyone should be able to do it.

data.name: 0025 (286.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Is that true?

data.name: 0026 (286.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yeah. To put it simply, when speed reading you don't read the characters one by one...

data.name: 0027 (286.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ...instead you look at the whole page as an image and memorize it all at once.

data.name: 0028 (286.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I see, I'll make sure to take that to heart.
